column4: Thanks a million, now I am going to find beryl and install it.
Ok, one last silly question on my ubuntu, in Gnome, how do I figure out which version of ubuntu i have?
Ok, one last silly question on my ubuntu, in Gnome, how do I figure out which version of ubuntu i have?
probably something like help > about.  but, 'lsb_release -a' will tell you
